attributes.action: Stop making knives with the pointed end they all should be made flat ended
attributes.additional_details: I think this will save life’s on the streets of uk and there is just no need to have a pointed knife this will have a good impact to the country and hope this will stop and save life’s
attributes.background: I think that the government should ban making pointed knives this could stop people from getting stabbed on the streets in uk. The knifes should be flat end so it dose not penetrate in to anything or anyone there is no need for a pointed knives

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Require all household knives to have blunt ends
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/714865
